Package gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfluentKafkaSchemaRegistry
    Extension of KafkaSchemaRegistry that wraps Confluent's SchemaRegistryClient.
    FixedSchemaKafkaAvroExtractor
    Extract avro records from a Kafka topic using a fixed schema provided by FixedSchemaKafkaAvroExtractor.STATIC_SCHEMA_ROOT_KEY.
    KafkaAvroExtractor<K>
    An abstract implementation of Extractor for Kafka, where events are in Avro format.
    KafkaExtractor<S,D>
    An implementation of Extractor for Apache Kafka.
    KafkaPartition
    A kafka topic partition.
    KafkaPartition.Builder  
    KafkaPartition.KafkaLeader  
    KafkaRecord  
    KafkaSimpleExtractor Deprecated
    use KafkaDeserializerExtractor and KafkaDeserializerExtractor.Deserializers#BYTE_ARRAY instead
    KafkaSimpleJsonExtractor  
    KafkaSimpleSource Deprecated
    use KafkaDeserializerSource and KafkaDeserializerExtractor.Deserializers#BYTE_ARRAY instead
    KafkaSource<S,D>
    A Source implementation for Kafka source.
    KafkaTopic
    A kafka topic is composed of a topic name, and a list of partitions.
    KafkaUtils
    A Utils class for Kafka.
    MultiLongWatermark
    A Watermark that holds multiple long values.
    SimpleKafkaSchemaRegistry
    Extension of KafkaSchemaRegistry that treats the topic name and the schema as the same string.
    UniversalKafkaSource<S,D>
    A KafkaSource to use with arbitrary KafkaExtractor.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    KafkaOffsetRetrievalFailureException  
    PreviousOffsetNotFoundException  
    StartOffsetOutOfRangeException
